snippet: Darion M. Aguilar, who killed two people at a Maryland shopping mall in January, had visited websites devoted to shootings with mass fatalities, and had acknowledged in his journal a need for psychological help.
abstract: Maryland authorities say Darion M Aguilar, teenager who opened fire with a shotgun inside The Mall in Columbia in January 2014, was obsessed with the Columbine High School massacre.
lead_paragraph: Darion M. Aguilar, who killed two people at a Maryland shopping mall in January, had visited websites devoted to shootings with mass fatalities, and had acknowledged in his journal a need for psychological help.

headline.main: Columbine Said to Influence Gunman at Maryland Mall
headline.print_headline: Columbine Said to Influence Gunman at Maryland Mall
